column5: Just a heads up. I got two 31 Series AGM deep cycle batteries for 115$ each at a place in Hamilton called GNB. They at seconds cause the handle at the top is missing. One year warranty. Their number is 905-549-4454.
You made off like a bandit there.
Just paid $400 with tax for a single 31 AGM
He just got a skid of them. He has 27 series wet cell and gel too for same price.
I have no connection to them, just sharing a good deal.
Us guys in this area have dealt with Great Northern battery for years. Can't beat them and their batteries are quality.
Yes Great guys to deal with.. been doing it for years ... Boat.. Car and my Truck....
Ugh, I need two Group 31s and a new starting battery for the main.,  Those are some killer prices.

Ugh, I need two Group 31s and a new starting battery for the main.,  Those are some killer prices.  Dang, Bill. I just drove to Barrie and Orillia yesterday on business.Could have easily helped you out.
Dang, Bill. I just drove to Barrie and Orillia yesterday on business.Could have easily helped you out.  I appreciate the offer bud!  I'll have to make an excuse to get down that way.
I always get my batteries there, best prices anywhere.
